description: Use the LudgerTag Mono kit (LT-MONO-96) to release and label neutral and amino monosaccharides from your samples and compare to standards (GlcN, GalN, Gal, Man, Glc, Fuc, Xyl) by (U)HPLC analysis.- Release of neutral and amino monosaccharides from glycoprotein therapeutics or pre-released glycans and subsequent labelling with 2-aminobenzoic acid (2-AA).- This kit can be used for quantitative routine monosaccharide analysis.- Kit sufficient for 96 analyses.
name: Monosaccharide Release and Labeling Kit
